parameters.interpretation: Steps through available aperture values from minimum (0) to maximum (n). Set n accordingly!
Move to specified focal length in mm, from minimum (0) to maximum (max). Set max accordingly!
Move to specified focal length: 0.0 = wide, 1.0 = tele
parameters.caption: Zoom

parameters.interpretation: Start/stop zooming at specified rate: -1.0 = zoom wider fast, 0.0 = stop, +1 = zoom tele fast
Calculate and set auto white balance
Use latest auto white balance setting

Steps through available exposure values from minimum
(0) to maximum (n). Set n accordingly!
Shutter angle in degrees, multiplied by 100
Shutter speed value as a fraction of 1, so 50 for 1/50th of a second
Some cameras don't allow separate control of frame guides and status overlays.

index.name: safe area percentage
index.interpretation: percentage of full frame used by safe area guide (0 means off)

parameters.interpretation: 0 = disable bars, 1-30 = enable bars with timeout (seconds)

Sets the tally front and tally rear brightness to the same level.
0.0 = minimum,
1.0 = maximum

Sets the tally front brightness.
0.0 = minimum,
1.0 = maximum

Sets the tally rear brightness.
0.0 = minimum,
1.0 = maximum
Tally rear brightness cannot be turned off

index.name: latitude
index.interpretation: BCD - sDDDdddddddddddd where s is the sign: 0 = north (+), 1 = south (-); DDD degrees, dddddddddddd decimal degrees

index.name: longitude
index.interpretation: BCD - sDDDdddddddddddd where s is the sign: 0 = west (-), 1 = east (+); DDD degrees, dddddddddddd decimal degrees

index.name: speed
index.interpretation: -ve Multiple speeds backwards, 0 = pause, +ve = multiple speeds forwards

index.name: flags
index.interpretation: 1<<0 = loop, 1<<1 play all, 1<<5 disk1 active, 1<<6 disk2 active, 1<<7 time-lapse recording

index.name: pan velocity
index.interpretation: -1.0 = full speed left, 1.0 = full speed right

index.name: tilt velocity
index.interpretation: -1.0 = full speed down, 1.0 = full speed up
